annotation.author: captain_cc_2008@163.com
annotation.func: Test the UserAnalyze rdd function and display it at the console

process.sql: select msg,dt,get_json_object(translate(msg,'\;',''), '$.deviceId') as device_id, get_json_object(translate(msg,'\;',''), '$.itemFeature.biz_id') as biz_id,get_json_object(translate(msg,'\;',''), '$.itemFeature.biz_type') as biz_type,get_json_object(translate(msg,'\;',''), '$.pvId') as pvId,get_json_object(translate(msg,'\;',''), '$.posId') as posId,get_json_object(translate(msg,'\;',''), '$.label') as label from dm_rca.dm_rca_rcm_rank_all_msg_shucang_v2 where dt='${BASE_DATE_10}'
select * from (select msg,dt,device_id,biz_id,biz_type,pvId,posId,label,count(*) over(partition by dt,device_id,biz_id,biz_type order by pvId) count_num_rn from TMP_TBL_01) where count_num_rn=1

process.annotation: 3.增加用的ctr过滤用户特征数据
process.sql: select a.dt,a.device_id,a.biz_type,a.biz_id from TMP_TBL_02 a join dm_rca.dm_rca_user_ctr b on upper(a.device_id) = upper(b.device_id) and a.dt = b.dt where b.dt='${BASE_DATE_10}' and b.ctr > 0
select a.dt,a.device_id,a.biz_type,a.biz_id,a.msg,a.pvId,a.posId,a.label from TMP_TBL_01 a join TMP_TBL_03 b on a.dt=b.dt and a.device_id=b.device_id and a.biz_type=b.biz_type and a.biz_id=b.biz_id
insert into table dm_rca.dm_rca_train_sample_all_shucang_v2_filter_by_user PARTITION(dt) select msg,device_id,biz_type,biz_id,pvId,posId,label,dt from TMP_TBL_04
